channel.title: Simplicity-X • Looking For Another Developer
channel.description:
[center]Hello, here are Simplicity-X we strive daily, to work hard and provide everything our players want to see. We're different from alot of other 718's due to what we're doing and how we're doing it. We have tons of content being added everyday, and in our next patch release their will be 3 new interfaces. Some new bosses, armors, weapons, places to go, quests, new monsters to kill, new skilling options, and alot more. I have everything I need, I have every resource I need, and I do everything with my team how it is now, but I'm searching for ONE more developer to join up on the team. Requirements is you must contribute some of your time (obviously) but I don't want no inactive developer that goes MIA for days, randomly. You need to be VERY dedicated this will be a LONG-TERM position. You must have at least a almost intermediate level understanding for Java. [b][u]I'm willing to work with people who aren't that experienced, as long as you know the basics, and I will help you understand anything you don't, and teach you anything you can't do that you're interesting in, or trying to do.[/u][/b]
[u][b]- Leave a brief summary about you, and your RSPS / programming experiences, and reply here with your skype name and I will contact you.[/b][/u] [/center]

item.title: Simplicity-X • Looking For Another Developer
item.dc:creator: @Simplicity-X Simplicity-X
item.description:
@Simplicity-X wrote:

[quote=“GfServerMaker1, post:5, topic:550983”]Hello, i would like to have a shot.

I do not have a good experience with java on 718’s and im willing to change my knowledge.

my real life name is : Oscar

Some of my previous works were a while ago when rswebclients was still running, i have a server called " vengeance-x " it had 15-30 players daily.
i believe i could be of great use because im active a lot! i love playing and dedicating my time to something other than math homework… Hit me up in a pm mate[/quote]

I’d just like to say revisions don’t exactly matter, Java is java. I’ll shoot you a msg.

Read full topic

item.title: Simplicity-X • Looking For Another Developer
item.dc:creator: @Simplicity-X Simplicity-X
item.description:
@Simplicity-X wrote:

[center]Hello, here are Simplicity-X we strive daily, to work hard and provide everything our players want to see. We’re different from alot of other 718’s due to what we’re doing and how we’re doing it. We have tons of content being added everyday, and in our next patch release their will be 3 new interfaces. Some new bosses, armors, weapons, places to go, quests, new monsters to kill, new skilling options, and alot more. I have everything I need, I have every resource I need, and I do everything with my team how it is now, but I’m searching for ONE more developer to join up on the team. Requirements is you must contribute some of your time (obviously) but I don’t want no inactive developer that goes MIA for days, randomly. You need to be VERY dedicated this will be a LONG-TERM position. You must have at least a almost intermediate level understanding for Java. I’m willing to work with people who aren’t that experienced, as long as you know the basics, and I will help you understand anything you don’t, and teach you anything you can’t do that you’re interesting in, or trying to do.

- Leave a brief summary about you, and your RSPS / programming experiences, and reply here with your skype name and I will contact you.
[/center]
